summary: Three 6 Mafia is an American rap group from Memphis, Tennessee, formed in 1991. They started as an underground group with a scary theme and became really popular. Their first album, *Mystic Stylez*, is very influential. They've released music on different labels and two of their albums are platinum. In 2006, they won an Academy Award for their song "It's Hard out Here for a Pimp." They've sold 5.5 million albums worldwide.
title: Three 6 Mafia
